long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your favorite store has a reward program that requires you to add each coupon one by one? Do you want to just enter your reward number and get some $ off?

This extension is what you need! Go to your favorite reward program, click on the extension, click start, wait, and boom! All the coupons are loaded to your account. Next time you checkout, enter your reward number, and if there is any coupon matching what you bought, see your bill decrease!

Note: This extension is intended to the people who don't want to spend time looking at coupons and buying the products depending on the available coupons.

Currently supported reward programs:
- Just For U (Jewel Osco, Safeway, ...)
- (Experimental) CVS, Hannaford, H-E-B

This application is still in development, feel free to reach out to me at corentin.leman.apps@gmail.com if you would like your favorite reward program to be added to this list!

Update 0.3.0:
- Added support for most of the stores using Just For U. Feel free to contact me for a full list, Google doesn't let me enumerate it here.

Update 0.4.0:
- Fixed all the stores as of 03/09/2024
- Updated to Manifest V3

Update 0.4.3:
- (Experimental) Added support for CVS, Hannaford, and H-E-B

Update 0.4.4:
- Fix for For-U, stores like Safeway might still take a while to clip everything, will improve the loader to indicate when it's actually done in next version.

Update 0.4.5 & 0.4.6:
- Fix for CVS (tentative)

Update 0.5.0:
- Added support for Publix and ShopRite.
